entry.title: Polo Red Eau De Parfum Spray for Men by Ralph Lauren
entry.summary:

Type:

Launched by the design house of Ralph Lauren. A sensual mens cologne crafted with a modern mix of warm ginger deepened with aromatic sage and rounded out by rich, natural woods and musk accord for a lasting impression of warm sensuality

entry.title: Ralph's Club Eau de Parfum Spray for Men by Ralph Lauren
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ralph Lauren
Type: Eau de Parfum
Price: 107.95

Ralph's Club Eau de Parfum Spray for Men by Ralph Lauren is a sophisticated and intoxicating fragrance that captures the essence of a classic gentlemen's club, with its blend of aromatic and woody notes creating a captivating and refined scent that exudes confidence and style.

Launched by the design house of Ralph Lauren in the year 2020. This aromatic fougere fragrance has a blend of melon, mandarin orange, cucumber, basil, sage, geranium, musk, woodsy notes, and suede.

entry.title: Midnight Romance For Women By Ralph Lauren Eau De Parfum Spray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ralph Lauren
Type: Eau de Parfum
Price: 56.95 - 87.99 (3 variants)

Defining passion since 2014, Ralph Lauren Midnight Romance is a premium feminine aroma for the head-strong, determined woman of today who knows what she wants and how to get it. The elegant fragrance comes with a hint of midnight romance, which is the signature note of the refreshing perfume spray. The light scent is ideal for both day and evening time.

entry.title: Safari For Women By Ralph Lauren Eau De Parfum Spray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ralph Lauren
Type: Eau de Parfum
Price: 75.95

Safari by Ralph Lauren is a raw fragrance that reminds you of a woman wearing khakis and a safari hat, exuding confidence and pride. The fragrance also has subtle hints of romance in it.

entry.title: Big Pony 1 Eau de Toilette Spray for Women by Ralph Lauren
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ralph Lauren
Type: Eau de Toilette
Price: 64.99 - 74.95 (2 variants)

Big Pony 1 is a sporty fragrance especially designed for the self-confident and courageous woman. It's floral and citrusy notes lend it all that freshness and a unique energetic vibe. Big Pony 1 is the perfect fragrance to wear during the day as it keeps you smelling great even hours after wearing it.

entry.title: Ralph Love Eau de Toilette Spray for Women by Ralph Lauren
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ralph Lauren
Type: Eau de Toilette
Price: 59.95

Ralph Lauren Love was launched by the American fashion house Ralph Lauren in 2016. The magical fragrance starts with luscious notes of red apples which slowly blend in the sweet notes of cotton candy, leaving you feeling feminine and flirty all day long.

entry.title: Blue Eau de Toilette Spray for Women by Ralph Lauren
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ralph Lauren
Type: Eau de Toilette
Price: 57.95 - 79.95 (2 variants)

Blue Eau de Toilette Spray for Women by Ralph Lauren is a fresh and invigorating fragrance that evokes a sense of freedom and natural beauty, with its blend of floral and fruity notes capturing the essence of a bright and sunny day.

entry.title: Polo Double Black Eau de Toilette Spray for Men by Ralph Lauren
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ralph Lauren
Type: Eau de Toilette
Price: 56.95 - 69.95 (2 variants)

While its bottle says a different story, the Polo Double Black is a light and breezy Oriental fragrance that transcends conventions with its rich and full bodied blend of contrasting scents. Easily recognizable by its delicious frozen mango, the Polo Double Black gradually hazes out into the intense spiciness of pepper, fried coffee and Indonesian nutmeg, finally drying down with warm woody cardamom and juniper berries.

entry.title: Ralph Lauren Woman for Women by Ralph Lauren Eau de Parfum Spray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ralph Lauren
Type: Eau de Parfum
Price: 65.98 - 91.95 (2 variants)

Woman from Ralph Lauren is all that a woman could ask for in a fragrance. Launched in 2017, the relatively new fragrance is exquisite, to say the least. The perfumer behind this brilliant concoction is none other than Anne Flipo.

entry.title: Romance Eau de Parfum Spray for Women by Ralph Lauren
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ralph Lauren
Type: Eau de Parfum
Price: 52.99 - 98.95 (4 variants)

Ralph Lauren Romance for Women is an Eau de Parfum. It is a feminine fragrance with intense floral notes and woody undertones with hints of citrus. It is a very romantic, intimate and happy fragrance that exudes positive energy. The combination of rose, citrus and violets makes this fragrance unique.

entry.title: Polo Ultra Blue for Men by Ralph Lauren Eau De Toilette Spray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ralph Lauren
Type: Eau de Toilette
Price: 49.95 - 73.95 (2 variants)

Polo Ultra Blue is a cool, citrusy, and salty sensation that lasts. This crisp, refreshing burst of fragrance is for the man who balances success and leisure. Polo Ultra Blue evokes the cool and crisp feeling of the sea. The long-lasting scent embodies ultimate freshness for the sporting gentleman. With its notes of cedrat lemon, ambertonic, and salt minerals, Polo Ultra Blue is a burst of refreshing aquatic fragrance. Polo Ultra Blue evokes the cool, crisp feeling of the sea. This long-lasting scent embodies ultimate freshness for the sporting gentleman. With its notes of cedrat lemon, ambertonic and salt minerals, Polo Ultra Blue is a burst of refreshing aquatic fragrance.

Notes: Cedrat, Mineral accord, Artical, Ambertonic, Lemon, Basil, Verbena

entry.title: Polo Red For Men By Ralph Lauren Eau De Toilette Spray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ralph Lauren
Type: Eau de Toilette
Price: 60.95 - 111.95 (4 variants)

Polo Red is an Eau de Toilette for men by Ralph Lauren. It is an intensely subtle masculine fragrance with woody and fruity notes. It draws inspiration from fiery nature of color red and is energizing and fiercely passionate. It is a very warm fragrance with a hint of coffee that is perfect for cool evenings.

entry.summary:
Vendor: Ralph Lauren
Type: Eau De Toilette Spray
Price: 59.95 - 74.95 (2 variants)

Launched by the design house of Ralph Lauren in the year 2018. This aromatic fruity fragrance features a blend of musk, cedar, mandarin orange, grapefruit, lavender, saffron, pineapple, lemon, red apple, mint and orange blossom.

Launched by the design house of Ralph Lauren. This feminine fragrance has blend of tuberose, orange blossom, sambac jasmine, black currant, pink pepper, neroli,black vanilla, sandalwood, and amber wood.

entry.title: Polo Sport Eau de Toilette Spray for Men by Ralph Lauren
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ralph Lauren
Type: Eau de Toilette
Price: 46.95 - 59.95 (2 variants)

The person who created the Ralph Lauren Polo Sport fragrance for men is called Harry Fremont. This is considered as among the classic men’s fragrances from the 90s. It has a fresh, aquatic character which made it very popular as a casual wear scent.

entry.title: Polo Blue Sport For Men By Ralph Lauren Eau De Toilette Spray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ralph Lauren
Type: Eau de Toilette
Price: 56.95 - 71.95 (2 variants)

Polo Blue Sport is an Eau de Toilette for men by Ralph Lauren. It is a fougere fragrance that has aromatic accords. It has green and citrusy notes with undertones of wood and herbs. The fragrance has a very fresh natural feel to it and works really well for warm sunny days.

entry.title: Polo Blue Eau de Parfum Spray for Men by Ralph Lauren
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ralph Lauren
Type: Eau de Parfum
Price: 75.95 - 89.95 (2 variants)

Launched in 2003, Ralph Lauren Polo Blue is an aromatic fougere aimed at the sporty and charming man. A man who dares to do so with a wit and devilish confidence. He remains unperturbed by the challenges life throws at him. A man who walks through the good and bad times with a smile on his face.

entry.title: Polo Blue For Men By Ralph Lauren Eau De Toilette Spray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ralph Lauren
Type: Eau de Toilette
Price: 39.95 - 122.95 (5 variants)

Polo Blue is an Eau de Toilette for men by Ralph Lauren. It is a masculine fragrance that has fruity notes with woody and herby undertones. There is a hint of musk and basil in blend that makes it fresh and rich. It is a perfect day fragrance for men.

entry.title: Ralph Eau de Toilette Spray for Women by Ralph Lauren
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ralph Lauren
Type: Eau de Toilette
Price: 45.95 - 74.95 (3 variants)

Ralph is an Eau de Toilette for women by Ralph Lauren. It is a feminine fragrance created especially for young women in 15 to 25 age bracket. It has floral notes with fruity and citrusy undertones and a hint of musk. It is fresh, youthful and a great daytime fragrance for warm summers.

entry.title: Polo Black Eau de Toilette Spray for Men by Ralph Lauren
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ralph Lauren
Type: Eau de Toilette
Price: 61.65 - 111.95 (4 variants)

Polo Black cologne is an Eau de Toilette for men by Ralph Lauren. It is a warm woody fragrance with undertones of herbs and citrus. The blend of warm woods and fresh citruses creates an interesting mix to give you an aroma that is unique.
